title: Bug 6009: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard feature, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank when a .java file is open in the editor.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field - it should default to the current type in the editor.
